vendor_name: InterContinental Johannesburg O.R. Tambo Airport Hotel
title: Johannesburg Five-Star Airport Escape with Fine-Dining Restaurant & Onsite Spa
description: Where convenience and luxury meet, a stay at the InterContinental Johannesburg O.R. Tambo Airport, an IHG Hotel, guarantees you're perfectly placed for modern adventures and wild safaris. This five-star escape boasts an exceptional day spa, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and an indoor heated swimming pool. Follow the call of fine dining to Quills Restaurant and Cocktail Bar, where South African produce is the specialty and dishes can be matched with outstanding local wines.
location_description: InterContinental Johannesburg O.R.Tambo Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Opposite Int'l Arrivals Hall O.R. Tambo International Airport Kempton Park, Johannesburg, 1619, South Africa

title: Elegant Johannesburg Garden Escape with Outdoor Pool
description: Discover the many layers of South Africa’s diverse capital at the elegant Holiday Inn Johannesburg Sunnyside Park, an IHG Hotel. Step back in time at this stunning Victorian-style property set on four acres of lush gardens. Cool off with a dip in the sparkling swimming pool and when you start feeling peckish, head over to the gleaming Milner’s Restaurant where you can sit outside with a cold pint and a hearty meal of North African and European dishes.
location_description: Holiday Inn Johannesburg Sunnyside Park, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Princess of Wales Terrace, Johannesburg 2041, South Africa

title: Magnificent Johannesburg Escape in the Heart of the Art Deco District
description: Escape to the zesty heart of South Africa with a sophisticated stay at voco Johannesburg Rosebank, an IHG Hotel. This stunning hotel is located in the pumping Art Deco district and is surrounded by world-class restaurants and boutiques, making it the perfect destination to get in touch with the vibrant way of life. The city has been praised as one of the most successful rebirths, with its ancestry and culture celebrated through superb museums, monuments and memorials.
location_description: voco Johannesburg Rosebank, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 24 Cradock Avenue, Rosebank, Johannesburg, 2196 South Africa

title: Johannesburg Contemporary Cool with Upscale Restaurant & Bar
description: Pair the high energy of Johannesburg with cosmopolitan cool when you stay at Holiday Inn Johannesburg - Rosebank, an IHG Hotel, located in the chic suburb of Rosebank just north of the city centre. Splash about in the outdoor swimming pool before heading over to Velvet restaurant for decadent dining matched with an extensive list of South African wines. For the perfect end to a night in, enjoy a glass or two on the alfresco terrace while watching the sunset.
location_description: Holiday Inn Johannesburg - Rosebank, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: The Zone, Oxford Road, Rosebank, Johannesburg, 2196 South Africa

title: Contemporary Johannesburg Airport Stay with Glittering Outdoor Pool
description: Discover the best of South Africa’s diverse capital with a stylish layover stay at Holiday Inn Johannesburg Airport, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned between the airport and the city centre, discover the Apartheid Museum and Johannesburg Zoo before returning from your day's adventures with a refreshing dip in the sparkling swimming pool. When you start feeling peckish, refuel at the Hotel Restaurant before catching the complimentary shuttle bus to the airport.
location_description: Holiday Inn Johannesburg Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 100 North Rand Road, Johannesburg, 1462 South Africa
